Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the administration for children’s services to conduct a study regarding child protective caseloads and workloads.

Items.MatterName: Requiring the administration for children’s services to conduct a study regarding child protective caseloads and workloads.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the administration for children’s services to report annually on the aggregate findings and recommendations of its child fatality review
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the administration for children’s services to report annually on the aggregate findings and recommendations of its child fatality review.

Items.Title: Resolution in support of the Home Stability Support plan, which would create a new statewide rent supplement for families and individuals who are eligible for public assistance benefits and who are facing eviction, homelessness, or the loss of housing due to situations such as domestic violence or hazardous living conditions
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Support of the Home Stability Support Plan
